description:
O&O DeskInfo is a free tool that displays all important system information directly on the desktop.

O&O DeskInfo provides a comprehensive overview of key system metrics such as CPU, RAM, drives, and network usage right on your desktop. Users can customize the display, including position, font size, and color. The software is portable, requiring no installation, and can alert users to unknown USB device connections. Additionally, information can be easily copied and shared for support purposes. O&O DeskInfo is free for private, business, and educational use.
